Job Description: The Big Data Developer is responsible for designing, developing and rolling out of customer facing business critical functionalities over Big Data and NoSQL ecosystems,.         The role involves understanding requirements, conducting research and innovations to develop and implement an optimum design to support the requirements.          Document the detailed design and the rationale for choosing the various design components.           Own the delivery including low level design, code, test cases, deployment model, support model, documentation and training.            Level Descriptor        The Big Data developer drives the IT software design, development and execution of the design spanning Big Data, NoSQL, Streaming and Messaging components;           The role involves using expertise, experience, research and trials in choosing the right software technologies, components and software stacks that suit the business requirements.          Experience :5 to 10 years software development experience. Telecommunications and Mobility experience preferred.             Purpose - Broad objective of the role        Reporting to the Deputy General Manager/General Manager, Mobility   IT   Systems, the   Big Data developer   will be responsible for the design  , development, testing, release, deployment, documentation and support   of the IT Applications supporting the Mobility Business Unit.           The developer will also be responsible to do peer code reviews, load testing, performance tuning, optimization, and monitoring of highly scalable codebases.          The Mobility applications will include various application models including internally developed,   COTs   and SaaS.
